RoomReservationSystem.controller.api

Class EventReservationApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomReservationSystem.controller.api.ReservationApiController
      • RoomReservationSystem.controller.api.EventReservationApiController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/eventReservation")
public class EventReservationApiController
extends ReservationApiController
